    • Method Detail

      • setAnchors

        public void setAnchors(float aX,
              float aY)
        Sets the anchor values used by this ViewGroup if it's children do not have anchor values supplied directly (via individual LayoutParams).
        Parameters:
        aX - x-axis anchor value (offset computed by multiplying this value by the child's width).
        aY - y-axis anchor value (offset computed by multiplying this value by the child's height).

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scale)
        Sets the scale (0-1) of the MarkerLayout.
        Parameters:
        scale - The new value of the MarkerLayout scale.

      • getScale

        public float getScale()
        Retrieves the current scale of the MarkerLayout.
        Returns:
        The current scale of the MarkerLayout.
